summary: Completed comprehensive testing of JWT authentication, notification dropdown, role templates, and SMS template editor features. Fixed critical React Router bug preventing frontend from loading.

minor_bugs.issue: SMS template update expects string format but receives object
minor_bugs.impact: Template updates fail with 422 validation error

minor_bugs.issue: User creation requires username and password fields
minor_bugs.impact: User creation was failing in tests until fields were added

critical_bugs_fixed.issue: Login component rendered outside BrowserRouter causing useNavigate() error

ui_bugs.issue: Settings link has pointer interception issues preventing clicks

passed_tests: Login form renders with username/password fields
Notification bell dropdown opens and displays notifications
Notification dropdown contains 'View All' link to /notifications
SMS template structure present in Settings page
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix SMS template update API to accept object format instead of string. Resolve pointer interception issue on Settings navigation link. Test role template auto-fill functionality and add user form validation.
